description: Share of Purchase Order Items, in which at least one Undesired Activity (user defined) has happened.
name: Undesired Activity Rate
template:
COUNT(DISTINCT CASE WHEN "_CEL_{p1}_ACTIVITIES"."ACTIVITY_{p2}" IN ({p3}) THEN "_CEL_{p1}_ACTIVITIES"."_CASE_KEY" ELSE NULL END)
/
COUNT(DISTINCT "_CEL_{p1}_ACTIVITIES"."_CASE_KEY")

description: Counts the number of automated activities (user defined)
name: Automated Activities
template:
SUM( CASE 
       WHEN ISNULL("_CEL_{p1}_ACTIVITIES"."USER_TYPE") = 0 
       AND  "_CEL_{p1}_ACTIVITIES"."ACTIVITY_{p2}"  IN ({p3})
       AND  "_CEL_{p1}_ACTIVITIES"."USER_TYPE" IN ({p4})
    THEN 1 ELSE NULL 
END )

name: Case_Leadtime_Actual
template:
CASE WHEN PROCESS EQUALS 'Record Goods Receipt' THEN
  CASE WHEN PROCESS EQUALS 'Send Purchase Order' THEN
      CALC_THROUGHPUT(FIRST_OCCURRENCE['Send Purchase Order'] TO LAST_OCCURRENCE['Record Goods Receipt'], REMAP_TIMESTAMPS("_CEL_P2P_ACTIVITIES"."EVENTTIME", DAYS))
  ELSE
      CALC_THROUGHPUT(FIRST_OCCURRENCE['Create Purchase Order Item'] TO LAST_OCCURRENCE['Record Goods Receipt'], REMAP_TIMESTAMPS("_CEL_P2P_ACTIVITIES"."EVENTTIME", DAYS))
  END
ELSE
    CASE WHEN PROCESS EQUALS 'Send Purchase Order' THEN
      CALC_THROUGHPUT(FIRST_OCCURRENCE['Send Purchase Order'] TO LAST_OCCURRENCE['Record Invoice Receipt'], REMAP_TIMESTAMPS("_CEL_P2P_ACTIVITIES"."EVENTTIME", DAYS))
    ELSE
      CALC_THROUGHPUT(FIRST_OCCURRENCE['Create Purchase Order Item'] TO LAST_OCCURRENCE['Record Invoice Receipt'], REMAP_TIMESTAMPS("_CEL_P2P_ACTIVITIES"."EVENTTIME", DAYS))
  END
END

description: Counts the number of manual activities (out of the considered activities)
name: Manual Activities
template:
SUM( CASE 
    WHEN ISNULL("_CEL_{p1}_ACTIVITIES"."USER_TYPE") = 0 
    AND  "_CEL_{p1}_ACTIVITIES"."ACTIVITY_{p2}"  IN ({p3})
    AND  "_CEL_{p1}_ACTIVITIES"."USER_TYPE" NOT IN ({p4})
    THEN 1 ELSE NULL 
END )*1.0

name: Repeated Activities
template:
SUM(CASE 
    WHEN "_CEL_{p1}_ACTIVITIES"."ACTIVITY_{p2}"  IN ({p3}) 
    AND ACTIVATION_COUNT("_CEL_{p1}_ACTIVITIES"."ACTIVITY_{p2}") >= 2 
    THEN ACTIVATION_COUNT("_CEL_{p1}_ACTIVITIES"."ACTIVITY_{p2}") -1 
    ELSE 0 
END)

name: CT Subprocess_1
template:
{p1}_BETWEEN(
    PU_<%= from_occ %>("{p2}", "_CEL_{p3}_ACTIVITIES"."EVENTTIME", "_CEL_{p3}_ACTIVITIES"."ACTIVITY_{p4}" = {p5}),
    PU_<%= to_occ %>("{p2}", "_CEL_{p3}_ACTIVITIES"."EVENTTIME", "_CEL_{p3}_ACTIVITIES"."ACTIVITY_{p4}" = {p6})
)
CALC_THROUGHPUT(FIRST_OCCURRENCE[<%= from_occ %>] TO FIRST_OCCURRENCE[<%= to_occ %>], REMAP_TIMESTAMPS("_CEL_{p3}_ACTIVITIES"."EVENTTIME", {p1}))

description: This KPI calculates the rate of considered activities performed by an automatic user type. (CASE LEVEL)
name: Automation Rate PU
template:
-- # Automated Activities
SUM( PU_COUNT("{p3}", "_CEL_{p1}_ACTIVITIES"."ACTIVITY_{p2}", 
       ISNULL("_CEL_{p1}_ACTIVITIES"."USER_TYPE") = 0 
       AND  "_CEL_{p1}_ACTIVITIES"."ACTIVITY_{p2}"  IN ({p4})
       AND  "_CEL_{p1}_ACTIVITIES"."USER_TYPE" IN ({p5})
))

/ 

(
-- # Automated Activities
SUM( PU_COUNT("{p3}", "_CEL_{p1}_ACTIVITIES"."ACTIVITY_{p2}", 
       ISNULL("_CEL_{p1}_ACTIVITIES"."USER_TYPE") = 0 
       AND  "_CEL_{p1}_ACTIVITIES"."ACTIVITY_{p2}"  IN ({p4})
       AND  "_CEL_{p1}_ACTIVITIES"."USER_TYPE" IN ({p5})
))

+
-- # Manual Activities
SUM( PU_COUNT("{p3}", "_CEL_{p1}_ACTIVITIES"."ACTIVITY_{p2}", 
       ISNULL("_CEL_{p1}_ACTIVITIES"."USER_TYPE") = 0 
       AND  "_CEL_{p1}_ACTIVITIES"."ACTIVITY_{p2}"  IN ({p4})
       AND  "_CEL_{p1}_ACTIVITIES"."USER_TYPE" NOT IN ({p5})
))
)

description: This KPI calculates the rate of considered activities performed by an automatic user type. (ACTIVITY LEVEL)
name: Automation Rate
template:
-- # Automated Activities
SUM( CASE 
       WHEN ISNULL("_CEL_{p1}_ACTIVITIES"."USER_TYPE") = 0 
       AND  "_CEL_{p1}_ACTIVITIES"."ACTIVITY_{p2}"  IN ({p3})
       AND  "_CEL_{p1}_ACTIVITIES"."USER_TYPE" IN ({p4})
    THEN 1 ELSE 0 
END )*1.0

/ 

(
-- # Automated Activities
SUM( CASE 
       WHEN ISNULL("_CEL_{p1}_ACTIVITIES"."USER_TYPE") = 0 
       AND  "_CEL_{p1}_ACTIVITIES"."ACTIVITY_{p2}"  IN ({p3})
       AND  "_CEL_{p1}_ACTIVITIES"."USER_TYPE" IN ({p4})
    THEN 1 ELSE 0 
END )*1.0
+
-- # Manual Activities
SUM( CASE 
    WHEN ISNULL("_CEL_{p1}_ACTIVITIES"."USER_TYPE") = 0 
    AND  "_CEL_{p1}_ACTIVITIES"."ACTIVITY_{p2}"  IN ({p3})
    AND  "_CEL_{p1}_ACTIVITIES"."USER_TYPE" NOT IN ({p4})
    THEN 1 ELSE 0 
END )*1.0
)

description: This KPI calculates the median time from the process start until the process end in days.
name: CT Total
SC/PC
template:
CASE 
 WHEN "EKPO"."PRETTY_NAME" IN ('PIN024','PIN020','PP1011','PP2005',	'PP2004') THEN 'PC'
 ELSE 'SC'
END

description: Share of Purchase Order Items in which Activities (user defined) have happened more than once.
name: Repeated Activity Rate
template:
COUNT(DISTINCT 
      CASE WHEN ACTIVATION_COUNT("_CEL_{p1}_ACTIVITIES"."ACTIVITY_{p2}") >= 2 
      AND "_CEL_{p1}_ACTIVITIES"."ACTIVITY_{p2}" IN ({p3})
      THEN "_CEL_{p1}_ACTIVITIES"."_CASE_KEY" ELSE NULL END
)
/
COUNT_TABLE("{p4}")

name: Missing Activities
template: COUNT(DISTINCT CASE WHEN PROCESS NOT EQUALS {p2} THEN "_CEL_{p1}_ACTIVITIES"."_CASE_KEY" ELSE NULL END)

name: Missing Activity Rate
template:
100.0*(COUNT(DISTINCT CASE WHEN PROCESS NOT EQUALS {p2} THEN "_CEL_{p1}_ACTIVITIES"."_CASE_KEY" ELSE NULL END)
/ 
COUNT(DISTINCT "_CEL_{p1}_ACTIVITIES"."_CASE_KEY"))
